text:
Who we are: Scirra! (http://www.scirra.com)

Location: London, UK (Twickenham, SW London)

We're looking for an ASP.net (c#) and Javascript developer to help develop our website and to help develop a large Javascript web app.

We will pay a competitive salary for the right candidate! We are angel funded, have been operating a year and have an extremely healthy stable revenue source and enough cash in the bank to cover all wages.

More details and how to apply can be found here: http://careers.stackoverflow.com/jobs/22447/asp-net-c-sharp-...
